Lightning Strike.name: Lightning Strike
Lightning Strike.description: [Magic Damage] Attacks a single enemy, dealing 1.5x damage. Effective against cavalry.

Body of Effulgent Beryl.name: Body of Effulgent Beryl
Body of Effulgent Beryl.description: [Passive] When attacked and entering battle, 30% chance to reduce enemy's damage by 90%. This effect has a 2-turn cooldown.

Advanced Teleport.name: Advanced Teleport
Advanced Teleport.description: [Assist] Active use. Teleports self to the chosen square and gain "Damage Taken -20%" and "At the end of action, restore 20% HP." Lasts 1 turn.

Reality Slash.name: Reality Slash
Reality Slash.description: [Magic Damage] Attacks a single enemy, dealing 1.5x damage. Critical hit rate is increase by 15%. This unit will attack before the opponent.

Skyfall.name: Skyfall
Skyfall.description: [Magic Damage] Attacks enemies within 5 blocks, dealing 0.32x AoE damage. Effective against fliers. The higher the enemy's mobility, the more damage this skill inflicts, increasing damage by 5% per mobility (up to 25%).

Dark Reaper.name: Dark Reaper
Dark Reaper.description: [Magic Damage] Attacks a single enemy, dealing 1.3x damage. Ignores 30% of enemy MDEF. After battle, restores 50% of damage dealt as HP.

MDEF Support.name: MDEF Support
MDEF Support.description: [Passive] After action, grant 1 adjacent ally MDEF+20%, as well as immunity to stun, “cannot be buffed”, and movement reduction effects. Lasts 1 turn.

Black Hole.name: Black Hole
Black Hole.description: [Magic Damage] Attacks multiple enemies within range, dealing 0.36x AoE damage. Deals 2 random debuffs* to each unit.
